text: Falling for the First Time is a song by Canadian rock band Barenaked Ladies. It was released as the third single for their 2000 album, Maroon. It was released as a single album on May 22, 2001. The song was written by Steven Page and Ed Robertson. It was included on the list of post-9/11 inappropriate titles distributed by Clear Channel after the 9/11 terrorist attacks. Category:Barenaked Ladies songs Category:2001 songs
title: Falling for the First Time
